https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/saPAMaZHZpOyKHt2iVcxhtUwcNP.jpg It is a world without language. A world where one is raised to respect the rules. Only one Boy questions the verity of what he has been taught, and he must decide whether to continue living in a society of fear or choose his own destiny. Days of Gray
